title: Determining Collagen Composition in Obese Gerbil Brown Adipose Tissue Using the Picrosirius-Polarization Method
content: The World Health Organization defines overweight and obesity as an abnormal or excessive accumulation of fat that presents a health risk. The problem has reached epidemic proportions, with more than four million people dying each year as a result of being overweight or obese in 2017, according to the Global Burden of Disease report [1]. This disease adversely affects most body systems as it is linked to the most widespread and costly medical problems, including type 2 diabetes, hypertension, coronary heart disease, and many forms of cancer.
